attributes.action: Send Politicians that support military action to the frontline to fight.
attributes.additional_details:
The world is awakening, and this once great land is of no exception. Scores of people are waking up to what is really going on, and even more people have had enough of wars being fought on our names for financial, material, and geo-political gain.

The world is also starting to unite, as we awaken from our long slumber, and this unification of the world is what you fear the most.

Prepare yourselves. We the people have spoken.
attributes.background:
We, the united peoples of the United Kingdom are sick, and tired of wars being fought in our name. We are sick of innocent lives being slaughtered, in our name. We have had enough of seeing our fellow countrymen come back in Coffins.

We have had enough. It's time YOU went to WAR!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of individuals to enlist themselves in the military.
